posts.author: Bloodedblade
posts.content: I have returned once more to the well good people.  I've been on a bit of a break from the game for a spell but have felt the itch that must be scratched again.  I need some nwn.  I have received excellent help from everyone here before and hoping to plead for aid from the build gods again.  I have been thinking about going with another ranger but this time really old school Rangery.  I'm looking for a stealthly scout type with dual wielding when possible and shield when needed.  Blade thirst in Amia has been modified to work on Bows as well so thats a nice plus.  One of my first toons in Nwn was a ranger and I'm feeling nostalgic I guess.  I found the ability to fight and and actually sneak around a bit fun.  I know it isn't the most powerful class in the game obviously which is why you don't see many but it hits my Aragorn sweet spot just right and I have your skills to help with that.  I generally play human chars and don't really do evil alignments to be honest.  I am flexible on the race if need be as well though.   I appreciate any and all help with this endeavor oh wise ones.
